user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: A Community patent system would fall automatically within the structures of the EU. This means democratic control by the European Parliament and the authority of the Court of Justice in the last resort (Amendments Nos 23 and 24).

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: In the Forest of Dean, which I represent, [REDACTED] years ago elvers (glass eels) were fished in abundance by the local population and sold on the streets for consumption as part of a traditional breakfast with bacon and eggs.
target_response: Il y a 40 ans, dans la forêt de Dean, que je représente, des civelles (alevins d’anguilles) étaient pêchées en abondance par la population locale, vendues en rue et consommées lors du petit déjeuner traditionnel, avec des œufs et du bacon.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: In the Forest of Dean, which I represent, 40 years ago elvers (glass eels) were fished in abundance by the local population and sold on the streets for consumption as part of a traditional breakfast with bacon and eggs.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: The latter led to the creation of the Iron Curtain, which divided Europe for [REDACTED] years, cutting off my country, Poland, from European democracy and integration.
target_response: Cette conférence a mené au rideau de fer qui a divisé l’Europe pendant 44 années, séparant mon pays, la Pologne, de la démocratie occidentale et de l’intégration.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: The latter led to the creation of the Iron Curtain, which divided Europe for 44 years, cutting off my country, Poland, from European democracy and integration.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: As far as visas for travel to the United States are concerned, almost [REDACTED] years after the fall of communism and four years after the new Member States from Central and Eastern Europe have joined the EU, inequality still exists.
target_response: En ce qui concerne les visas permettant de se rendre aux États-Unis, près de 20 ans après la chute du communisme et quatre ans après l'adhésion des nouveaux États membres d'Europe centrale et orientale, l'inégalité existe toujours.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: As far as visas for travel to the United States are concerned, almost 20 years after the fall of communism and four years after the new Member States from Central and Eastern Europe have joined the EU, inequality still exists.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: It is exactly what Afghanistan was [REDACTED] years ago when, in this Chamber - I mean in the old Chamber of the European Parliament - we made provision during the debate of the report on narcotics for the future of Afghanistan.
target_response: C'est exactement ce qu'était l'Afghanistan il y a maintenant 26 ans lorsque, dans cette salle - je veux dire dans l'ancien hémicycle du Parlement européen - nous avions pris des dispositions, lors du débat sur le rapport relatif aux stupéfiants, pour l'avenir de l'Afghanistan.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: It is exactly what Afghanistan was 26 years ago when, in this Chamber - I mean in the old Chamber of the European Parliament - we made provision during the debate of the report on narcotics for the future of Afghanistan.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I should like to draw your attention, Mr President, Commissioner, to the issue of phasing out in certain regions, [REDACTED] of them in all, which since enlargement have acquired the status of being statistically wealthier, whilst their actual economic situation has seen no improvement.
target_response: Monsieur le Président, Madame la Commissaire, je voudrais attirer votre attention sur la question du «phasing out» de certaines régions, 19 au total, qui, depuis l’élargissement, ont acquis le statut de régions statistiquement plus riches alors que leur situation économique réelle ne s’est pas améliorée.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I should like to draw your attention, Mr President, Commissioner, to the issue of phasing out in certain regions, 19 of them in all, which since enlargement have acquired the status of being statistically wealthier, whilst their actual economic situation has seen no improvement.

redacted_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I was a teacher myself for [REDACTED] years, mostly in primary education so I think I am quite justified in having a passion about looking at the reasons for this crisis.
target_response: J'ai moi-même enseigné pendant 30 ans, principalement dans le primaire, et je pense donc avoir toutes les raisons de me pencher avec une grande résolution sur les motifs de cette crise.
user_query: Please translate this sentence into French: I was a teacher myself for 30 years, mostly in primary education so I think I am quite justified in having a passion about looking at the reasons for this crisis.
